Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit a go-ahead grand slam in the seventh inning for a 5-4 advantage
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Emergency starter Richard Fitts pitched five shutout innings for Boston
Masataka Yoshida snapped a scoreless tie with a two-run homer in the sixth
Trevor Story hit a two-run shot in the seventh for a 4-0 lead
